/* 2023.09.24 수정중... SQL ID : TLOPageSQL.doCountCorporates 기업 카운트: 기준은 예시로 id=tlo의 member_seqno 4번, tc.tlo_seqno::INT = t.member_seqno */
select COUNT(*) from techdemand_corporate tc left outer join tblmember t on tc.tlo_seqno::INT = t.member_seqno left outer join tblbusiness b on t.biz_name = b.biz_name where b.biz_name = #{biz_name} AND tc.view_yn = 'Y'
